title: The Injustice Cure
description: Clive Silver has been taken advantage one too many times but when he tries to break the rules to get what he wants he accidently puts his wife in danger. She’s rescued by a stranger and Clive is branded a coward but something is happening to Clive, he’s changing and keen to prove his wife wrong he sets out on a mission to become a superhero.Can he overcome his fears and achieve his goal in the face of the biggest ever threat to lives of the citizens of Shoreline City?Super powers, science fiction and humour abound in this superhero thriller novel by Luke George.
author: Luke George
